do parameter.key need check NULL？

It's not required to check parameter.key NULL because it has default value "". Meanwhile, you cannot assign a null to Parameter.key because Java requires that the value of annotation's method must be a constant value, but the null is not a constant value.

怎么解决？

I have checked source about 2.6.1, the default retries is 

```
public static final int DEFAULT_RETRIES = 2;
```

and the real retries is 
```
int len = getUrl().getMethodParameter(invocation.getMethodName(), Constants.RETRIES_KEY, Constants.DEFAULT_RETRIES) + 1;
```

It is 3.

After set retries to 0 as follow: 

```
<dubbo:reference id="demoService" check="false" interface="com.alibaba.dubbo.demo.DemoService" retries="0"/>
```

It doesn't retry. The result is what we want. So please check your configuration and try it again. Also, you can debug deeply.

And use [qos](http://dubbo.apache.org/books/dubbo-user-book/references/qos.html) to online/offline them manually.

dubbo version `2.6.0`
调用某个服务的方法，`马上（几微秒）`返回 `Invoke remote method timeout. `，重复尝试几次，有的时候又可以正常调用，有的时候又返回timeout。

What command are you trying to use? It looks like you have typed a wrong command.

同样遇到该问题。这是dubbo的启动时检查（```dubbo.consumer.check=true```）导致的：初始化时提供方接口检查不通过，则之后该引用都是null。

我感觉这算是个bug。启动时检查的初衷应该是：检查不通过，应用启动失败。
I'm not using any action commands, and when the service is running normally, this happens every once in a while
